Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Canvas

        public Canvas(double sizeX,
              double sizeY,
              char background,
              boolean grid,
              boolean border,
              int id)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a naw canvas
        Parameters:
        sizeX - the width of the new canvas
        sizeY - the height of the new canvas
        background - the background character of the canvas
        grid - if the canvas has a grid
        border - if the canvas has a border
        id - the id of the new canvas
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the width or height of the new canvas is negative
